headline: Why Allegion (ALLE) is Poised to Beat Earnings Estimates Again
summary: Allegion (ALLE) has an impressive earnings surprise history and currently possesses the right combination of the two key ingredients for a likely beat in its next quarterly report.

headline: How Zentra's Google Wallet Integration Could Shape Allegion’s (ALLE) Digital Access Strategy
summary: In October 2025, Allegion's Zentra brand became the first to offer resident key capability in Google Wallet, allowing apartment residents to access building doors and amenities using their Android phone or Wear OS smartwatch rather than traditional keys or fobs. This integration streamlines security access for multifamily communities, providing both increased convenience for residents and potential operational efficiencies for property managers. We'll consider how Zentra's Google Wallet...
